title: Fusion finalising roster today for OCS Invitational- Fast track into the Oceanic Challenger Series!
body:
Luigi here, owner of Fusion,

With the OCS Invitational looming, with the top 3 out of 9 teams making it into the Challenger Series, Fusion is gauging last minute interest. If you want the opportunity to take your game to the next level, this is your chance. If you are dedicated, motivated, and have a competitive mindset contact me on League, or email me with your details. Look forward to hearing from you.

Open roster positions:
TOP-
JUNGLE-
MID-

Diamond 3 and above
Finalising roster TODAY.

IGN: Fusion Luigi
Email: luigi.bot19@gmail.com

replies.body:

>
> So is Fusion in OCS?

No. there is just like a last chance qualifier type thing for this OCS they are in that
